title: [Update: Both sizes] Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 will reportedly have a larger battery
content:
Samsung released the Galaxy Watch 4 series back in August, which marked a return to Google’s Wear OS platform after Samsung used its own Tizen software for several years. Assuming the company sticks to a yearly release schedule, the Galaxy Watch 5 series might show up in the latter half of this year, and now

The post [Update: Both sizes] Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 will reportedly have a larger battery appeared first on xda-developers.
